output_list.criticism: The 'sellOffline' function allows the owner to sell tokens to a specified address, but it does not validate the 'token_amount' input, which can lead to an integer overflow causing a large number of tokens to be transferred to the buyer.
The 'mintToken' function allows the owner to mint new tokens, but it does not validate the 'tokensToMint' input, which can lead to an integer overflow causing a large number of tokens to be minted.
The 'adm_trasfer' function is marked as 'onlyOwner', but it does not check if the caller is the owner, allowing any address to execute the transfer function.
The 'transferOwnership' function allows the owner to transfer ownership to a new owner, but it does not check if the caller is the owner, allowing any address to transfer ownership.
The '_transfer' function does not check if the caller is the owner, allowing any address to transfer tokens.
